member.summary: Begin tracking selection changes.

member.summary: Select just this item; all other items in Selection will be removed.

member.summary: Cancels the currently active SelectionChanger.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.HeaderedSelector.SelectionChanger`1.Select(`0)
member.summary: Queue something to be added to the selection. Does nothing if the item is already selected.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.HeaderedSelector.SelectionChanger`1.Unselect(`0)
member.summary: Queue something to be removed from the selection. Does nothing if the item is not already selected.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.HeaderedSelector.SelectionChanger`1.AddToSelection(`0)
member.summary: Commit selection changes.

member.summary: True if there is a SelectionChange currently in progress.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter
member.summary: Chapters gives you the ability to highlight key media content. Chapters are added to the a RadMediaItem object using its Items collection. In XAML RadMediaItem RadMediaChapter RadMediaItem Each chapter (which is a RadMediaChapter class) is defined with the following properties: Position - the exact time (in seconds) when the chapter begins Content - the content(title) of the chapter. ImageSource - url of the image with which the chapter is previewed in RadChaptersPresenter.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.remarks: This method is called when the IsSelected property changes to true.

member.summary: Called when the RadMediaChapter is unselected in a RadMediaItem.
member.remarks: This method is called when the IsSelected property changes to true.

member.summary: Identifies the Selected routed event.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter.ChapterClickEvent
member.summary: Occurs whenever a chapter is clicked.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter.IsSelected
member.summary: Specifies if this chapter is the currently playing.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of RadMediaChapter. The Position property is used when the user wants to jump to a specific moment of the media item.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv"> <telerik:RadMediaChapter Position="00:00:20" Title="Jump to 20 sec." /> <telerik:RadMediaChapter Position="00:02:50" Title="Jump to 2 min and 50 sec." /> </telerik:RadMediaItem> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the Title property of RadMediaChapter. The title property provides a string that will be displayed when the current RadMediaChapter is reached.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv"> <telerik:RadMediaChapter Position="00:00:20" Title="Jump to 20 sec." /> <telerik:RadMediaChapter Position="00:02:50" Title="Jump to 2 min and 50 sec." /> </telerik:RadMediaItem> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaChapter.ImageSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the image that will be used within the current instance of RadMediaChapter.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv"> <telerik:RadMediaChapter Position="00:00:20" Title="Jump to 20 sec." ImageSource="image1.jpg" /> <telerik:RadMediaChapter Position="00:02:50" Title="Jump to 2 min and 50 sec." ImageSource="image2.jpg" /> </telerik:RadMediaItem> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position in the playing video.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the video file associated with the media item. Source is of type Uri.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" /> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.ImageSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of the image will be used for representing this instance of RadMediaItem into RadMediaPlayer's playlist.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" ImageSource="image1.jpg"/> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that will be used as a title of this instance of RadMediaItem into RadMediaPlayer's playlist.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" Title="Title of movie1"/> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that will be used as a description of this instance of RadMediaItem into RadMediaPlayer's playlist.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" Description="Description of movie1"/> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.VideoWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that will be used to set the Width of the MediaElement in RadMediaPlayer.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" VideoWidth="200" VideoHeight="200" /> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.VideoHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the VideoHeight possible Value of the double object.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" VideoWidth="200" VideoHeight="200" /> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.VideoStretch
member.summary: Gets or sets the VideoStretch possible Value of the Stretch object.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer <telerik:RadMediaItem Source="movie1.wmv" VideoStretch="UniformToFill"/> </telerik:RadMediaPlayer>

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.BufferingTime
member.summary: The buffering time specifies the advance-load time (buffer) that the media item will need before starts playing. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaItem.IsSelected
member.summary: Identifies weather this RadMediaItem is currently selected.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer
member.summary: RadMediaPlayer is a flexible UI component based on Silverlight 2.0 platform. It allows users to play a variety of video and audio formats into a web page.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElementTotalTimeProperty
member.summary: A dependency property that holds the duration(in seconds) of the current media item. This is a string property and it is formatted in order to be used by a TextBlock.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElementCurrentTimeProperty
member.summary: A dependency property that holds the current time of the MediaElement in RadMediaPlayer. This is a string property and it is formatted in order to be used by a TextBlock.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElementTotalSecondsProperty
member.summary: A dependency property that holds the duration(in seconds) of the current media item. This property is used by TimeSlider's Maximum property.

member.summary: Identifies the TimeSliderTickMarks dependency property.

member.summary: Occurs whenever RadMediaPlayer changes its CurrentState.

member.summary: Occurs when the current RadMediaItem has ended.

member.summary: Occurs when RadMediaPlayer toggles between fullscreen and normal screen.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaStateChanged
member.summary: Occurs when RadMediaPlayer detects change in some of following properies: IsEnabled, IsErrorOccured, IsLoading, IsVideoControlsPanelVisible, IsChaptersPanelVisible, IsPlaylistVisible.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.AutoPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether RadMediaPlayer will play automatically the selected item or when click explicitly Play.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsVideoPanelPinned
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determnines whether the video panel is pinned or not. This property has lower precedence than .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsChaptersPanelPinned
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determnines whether the chapters panel is pinned or not. This property has lower precedence than .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsVideoPanelHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determnines whether the video panel is hidden or not. Takes precedence over and .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsChaptersPanelHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determnines whether the chapters panel is hidden or not. Takes precedence over .

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsVideoControlsPanelVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determnines whether the video panel is visible or not. This property has lower precedence than . This property is used internally by the player, which means its value may change in certain circumstances. If is set to false, the property will become false after the time in expires.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.PanelStaysOpenInterval
member.summary: The amount of time Video controls panel will stays open.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.ChaptersStaysOpenInterval
member.summary: The amount of time Chapters panel will stays open.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.TimeSliderTickMarks
member.summary: Collection of marks which are shown on the player chapters panel.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.CanSeek
member.summary: Get or set value to determine if seeking is enabled.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsAutoReverse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether when RadMediaPlayer reaches the end of its playlist and AutoReverse is set to True, RadMediaPlayer to play its first item in the playlist.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsAutoPlaylistAdvance
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether RadMediaPlayer should play the next item in the playlist when the current one ends.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsFullScreen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether RadMediaPlayer is displaying in full screen mode.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsPlaying
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether RadMediaPlayer is currently playing media.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the volume of the currently played RadMediaItem.
member.remarks: The Volume property ranges between 0 and 1.

example.code: <telerik:RadMediaPlayer x:Name="radMediaPlayer1" Width="500" Height="400" AutoPlay="True" Volume="0.7" />

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsMute
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating wheter the volume is mute or not. This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.SelectedMediaItem
member.summary: Gets the RadMediaItem that represents the currently played SelectedItem. This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets value for current position of the played . This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElement
member.summary: Gets the MediaElement object inside RadMediaPlayer.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.DownloadProgressValue
member.summary: Gets value representing the download progress of the currently selected . This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.DownloadProgressOffset
member.summary: Gets value representing the download progress offset of the currently selected . This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsPlaylistVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Playlist is visible initially. This is a DependencyProperty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElementTotalTime
member.summary: Gets the a string representing MediaElement's total time. This is a read-only dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElementCurrentTime
member.summary: Depricated! Gets the a string representing MediaElement's Position. This is a read-only dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.MediaElementTotalSeconds
member.summary: Gets the a double value representing MediaElement's total time. This is a read-only dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadMediaPlayer.IsChaptersPanelVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determnines whether the chapters panel is visible or not.
